channel.title: Fixing the Whispering Meta (No Starter King?)
channel.description:
# Elected King
Instead of their being a starter king in game there is elections on the 3rd day. The reason this is probably my favourite suggestion, because it can both be beneficial to both evils and blue dragon. Instead on relying on random chance for king to be good and bad, it relies on skill to become evil king. Instead on players being like "**40% Chance of EK** " it makes bd think, does his logs confirm him or are they easy to fake? Do I want to risk claiming to someone who maybe evil? It also makes unseen/cult ask a lot of questions as well, what if he dies and people think we are suspicious since we asked people to vote him? Is it worth loosing a member of the unseen/cult just to become king who players may not even claim to? Will it benefit us in the end?

item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
The biggest problem is there is no clear answer how to fix this issue entirely.

Despire even if it may pretty much delete WKM or any simmilar to this, the next thing that is going to need to be fixed is statistically more common Good King in throne and swinginess remains.
